Member Enumeration Documentation

enum chaos::test::TestLogger::OutFormat

The different possible log outputs.

Enumerator
PLAIN_TEXT 

Output plain text with no decoration or formatting.

PRETTY_TEXT 

Output plain text with decoration and formatting.

XML 

Output in XML format.

HTML 

Output in HTML format for viewing in a web browser.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

chaos::test::TestLogger::TestLogger ( )

Constructs a test logger interface.

By default the logger has no defined outputs.

Adds a file output for writing.

Parameters
pathFull path to the file to write to. This path does not need to exist beforehand.
formatThe format to write to the file in.
void chaos::test::TestLogger::addStdOut ( OutFormat  format)

Adds a standard output for writing.

Warning
Currently writing to only one standard output is supported. Calling this function multiple times will result in an exception. TODO:
Parameters
formatThe format to write standard output in.
